/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their architecture hinting at the urban landscape of the city. A few cars can be seen driving on the road, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static scene. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with a few clouds, providing a beautiful backdrop to the urban landscape below.
